participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious, adventurous, and thoughtful. I love exploring new ideas and sharing knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: I am the youngest of 3. I love reading mysteries in my free time. I went to college in Chicago. I love playing tennis.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Playful, imaginative, and cheerful. I enjoy playing games and creating stories with my dolls.
participant_2.background: I like playing outside in the sun with my dolls. I sleep in a princess bed. I am a four year old girl with brown eyes and hair. My daddy brings home flowers for me.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
I'm participant_2. I'm four years old.
Wow, you're so young! I'm [user 1's age].
I know. I'm still learning a lot.
What do you like to do?
I like to play outside in the sun with my dolls. I also like to sleep in my princess bed.
That sounds like fun. I like playing tennis and reading mysteries in my free time.
I've never played tennis before. Do you think I could try it sometime?
Sure, I'd love to show you how to play.
Great! I'll be ready.
So, what do you like to do at school?
I like to read books and learn new things. I also like to play games with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to learn new things too.
Me too. I like to learn about different countries and cultures.
That's great! I like to learn about different animals and plants.
Me too! I love animals. I have a dog and a cat at home.
That's great! I have a dog and a cat too.
We should have a playdate sometime.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to meet your pets.
Great! I'll let you know when we're free.
